meanings.definition: Having a wrinkled or pushed-in face, like a pug.
meanings.sent1: The puggier puppy had a cute, squished face.
meanings.sent2: She admired the puggier features of the little dog.
meanings.sent3: The puggier dog looked like it had just woken up from a nap.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as puggier as a crumpled paper ball.
meanings.sent5: The puggier appearance of the cat made everyone smile.

meanings.definition: To make something more wrinkled or pushed-in, resembling a pug.
meanings.sent1: She tried to puggier the clay to create a pug figurine.
meanings.sent2: The artist carefully puggiered the edges of the sculpture.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally puggiered the dough while trying to shape it.
meanings.sent4: The tailor puggiered the fabric to give it a unique texture.
meanings.sent5: The child attempted to puggier the playdough into a pug shape.

meanings.definition: A person who is fond of pugs.
meanings.sent1: She was known as the neighborhood puggier due to her love for pugs.
meanings.sent2: The puggier always had treats ready for the pug visitors.
meanings.sent3: The puggier's house was filled with pug-themed decorations.
meanings.sent4: The puggier's heart melted every time she saw a pug puppy.
meanings.sent5: Being a puggier meant always having pug calendars on the wall.
